item.title: Docker ubuntu 16.04에서 Caffe 설치
item.description:
1.package dependencies

$sudo apt-get install libprotobuf-dev libleveldb-dev libsnappy-dev libopencv-dev libhdf5-serial-dev protobuf-compiler
$sudo apt-get install --no-install-recommends libboost-all-dev

여기까지 하면, caffe compile시에 /usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lpthreads 가 발생 함.

2.additional dependencies

$sudo apt-get install libhdf5-serial-dev libgflags-dev libgoogle-glog-dev liblmdb-dev protobuf-compiler libatlas-base-dev
$sudo apt-get install cmake

3.caffe 소스 받기

$git clone https://github.com/BVLC/caffe.git

4.compile

$mkdir build
$cd build
$cmake ..
$make all -j8
$make install
$make runtest

5.commit docker image

변경된 docker container를 새로운 docker image에 commit한다.

$docker commit <container ID> <NewImageName>

이때, NewImageName은 현재 실행중인 container의 image여도 된다.
